long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes white flash on load.
If you find a page which it's not working on, please send me an email or post a comment.

When you are opening a new link, before the site is loaded we are often welcomed with a short flash of white light. It is annoying. This extension is here to protect your eyes.
